sentences.english: Each time, the financial sector rose, phoenix-like, from the ashes.
sentences.chinese: 每一次，金融業都像鳳凰般浴火重生。

sentences.english: Ashes of new homes, is gathering a new hope.
sentences.chinese: 浴火重生的新家園，正匯聚升騰起新的希望。

sentences.english: or keep trading in the hope of resurrection.
sentences.chinese: 或是繼續經營，以期浴火重生。

sentences.english: Sinburning is also a monthly ceremony where your anonymous confession is annihilated by fire.
sentences.chinese: 罪惡感的消除也將是一個你每月浴火重生的典禮。
也許又一個浴火重生的故事。

sentences.english: Unitech Kiln, shifts the clay alive, beyond the value.
sentences.chinese: 歐泰科窯爐，讓泥土浴火重生，超越價值。

sentences.english: Twenty-eight years later, GM is emerging from another agonizing reorganization.
sentences.chinese: 二十八年之後，通用汽車在重組風波中浴火重生。

sentences.english: We also can expect, see Baidu how " bath fire renascence ".
sentences.chinese: 我們也可以期待，看百度如何“浴火重生”。

sentences.english: Phoenix this non-mediocre bird, the bath fire rebirth is freer.
sentences.chinese: 鳳凰本非凡俗鳥，浴火重生更逍遙。

definition: to be reborn/rebirth
nirvana (Buddhism)
to shed one's mortal body and exchange one's bones (idiom); born again Daoist/to turn over a new leaf/fig. to change wholly/to create from other material (story, artwork etc)
variant of 盤|盘/wooden tray
lit. to break through a cocoon and turn into a butterfly (idiom)/fig. to emerge strong after a period of struggle/to get to a better place after going through difficult period

place sb on a field of death and he will fight to live (idiom based on Sunzi's "The Art of War" 孫子兵法|孙子兵法[Sun1 zi3 Bing1 fa3]); to fight desperately when confronting mortal danger/fig. to find a way out of an impasse
